text: Harthaal is a 1998 Indian Malayalam film directed by Krishnadas and starring Madhu and Vani Viswanath in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Vijayaraghavan as A.S.P Sanalkumar * Vani Viswanath as Mekhamala.S.Thamby * Madhu as Immam *Vijayakumar as Nazeer *Mala Aravindan as Ikkili Mathen *C. I. Paul as Rarichen * Kumarakom Raghunath as Comm.Shekharan Thamby * Chandni Shaju as Raani/Kunjuvava * Jagathy Sreekumar as Clinton *Kalpana as Dimple Mariya *Kaviyoor Renuka as Annakkutty *Abu Salim as Tarzan *Shammi Thilakan as Bakker *V. K. Sreeraman as Usthad *Maniyanpilla Raju as Kukko Singh * Devan as Gharam Pal Yadav/Wincent Cavelly *MohanRaj as Killer Robert * Indrans ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Harthaal
